resources.string: Jago Haridwar Classified is a leading advertising agency based in Haridwar. Since its establishment in December 2011, the company started a local classified newspaper named Jago Haridwar Classified and with the great effort and dedicated workflow by Mr. Anubhav, proprietor of Jago Haridwar by the end of the Year 2017 Jago Haridwar circulates more than 24000 copies every week all around the Punch Puri and Haridwar Area. \n\nClassified News Paper Advertising is a kind of advertisement promotion which provides a quick and short look of your business in its unique style. Booking for advertisement in Jago Haridwar starts every Saturday and closes every Thursday and the newspaper is published on Saturday. We have all the categories to describe you and your business. We have a well qualified technical team and a supporting customer care to help you find your destination. Our aim is to make our customers and their business happy, satisfying, and growing. We at Jago Haridwar Classified are a growing advertising agency of Haridwar, having the head office near Ranipur More, Haridwar. Jago Haridwar classified is the only classified which provides best services for their valuable customers in budget.

• Booking for corresponding Saturday would close on Thursday only.

 • Booking once confirmed will not be cancelled and amount will not be refunded in any condition.

 • Jago Haridwar Classified holds the right to cancel / amend any advertisement as per the advertisement Policy.
\u2022 What is the last date for advertisement booking?
\u2022 What happens if I book my advertisement on Thursday and I want to have it placed on the corresponding Saturday?
\u2022 What if I do not want my advertisement in the next issue?
\u2022 Is Haridwar Classified circulated in cities other than Haridwar as well?
\u2022 Will I get a receipt for the payment made for advertisement booking?
\tAdvertisement booking for Corresponding Sunday closes on Wednesday.

\tThough all efforts will be made at our end to have the advertisement placed as desired, all bookings taken on Thursday are on “best effort / against cancellation” basis. In case the advertisement is not placed on the corresponding Saturday, the same would be carried forward to the next issue.
\tYou can send us an email to initiate a refund, along with your banking details, the complete amount will be refunded to your account within 6-8 days and online only.
\tCurrently Haridwar Classified is ONLY circulated in Haridwar City. Total no of copies are 24000 for a edition.

\tAll receipts are available at our booking office and can be collected in person, if you want a scanned copy to be mailed to you, then by sending a mail to info@jagoharidwar.com you can request for the same.

 Jago Haridwar Classified’s website may contain links to web sites operated by other parties. Such links do not imply Jago Haridwar Classified’s endorsement of material on any other site and Jago Haridwar Classified disclaims all liability with regard to your access of such linked web sites.
